statements: DELETE FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE employee_id = 101 AND certification_date < '2020-01-01'
DELETE FROM employee_training_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Project Management'
DELETE FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_name = 'SQL Advanced Training';

DELETE FROM certification_records WHERE certification_id = 5 AND employee_id = 101;
DELETE FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Java Certification';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_type = 'Safety Check';
